item.title: 如何在Bluemix上搭建parse-server服务
item.description: 参考资料 Parse on IBM Bluemix Migrating from Parse to Bluemix Parse server migration to IBM bluemix 自动配置步骤 git clone https://github.com/ibm-cds-labs/parse-on-bluemix.git cf push Your-App-Name-On-Bluemix 手动配置步骤 注册Bluemix账号 http://bluemix.net 创建Cloud Foundry应用 选择Web
